mapper.select: SELECT session_id, table_id, start_time, end_time, is_active, created_at FROM table_sessions WHERE table_id = #{tableId} AND is_active = true ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO table_sessions (session_id, table_id, start_time, end_time, is_active, created_at) VALUES (#{sessionId}, #{tableId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{isActive}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
